name: Life of an Intern
description:
You shared your resume too much and the grim reaper approved your application. You are an intern of the grim reaper now. You must collect the souls that targeted before you die.

Controls
  • W A S D : Movement
  • Space / Mouse Primary : Attack
  • Esc / Pause : Pause
  • Mouse Scroll: Zoom (v0.2)
Assets
